column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " Who are you ?
#Text=We ambushed you .
#Text=Now tell us , who are you and what are you doing here ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Wait a second , there 's no way that a bunch of girls took us down .
#Text=" Suki says : " A bunch of girls , huh ?
#Text=Unagi is gon na eat well tonight .
#Text=" Katara says : " No , do n't hurt him !
#Text=He did n't mean it .
#Text=My brother is just an idiot sometimes .
#Text=" Aang says : " It 's my fault .
#Text=I 'm sorry we came here .
#Text=I wanted to ride the elephant koi .
#Text=" Oyaji says : " How do we know you 're not Fire Nation spies ?
#Text=Kyoshi stayed out of the war so far .
#Text=And we intend to keep it that way !
#Text=" Aang says : " This island is named for Kyoshi ?
#Text=I know Kyoshi !
#Text=" Oyaji says : " Ha !
#Text=How could you possibly know her ?
#Text=" Oyaji says : " Avatar Kyoshi was born here four hundred years ago .
#Text=She 's been dead for centuries .
#Text=" Aang says : " I know her because I 'm the Avatar .
#Text="
